examples.example: 每天傍晚我都会微笑着和邻居们说晚上好。

translate.english: Every evening I will smile and say good evening to the neighbors.

examples.example: 我走进商店，热情地和店员说晚上好。

translate.english: I walked into the shop and said good evening warmly to the clerk.

examples.example: 我出门散步遇到熟人，都会亲切地说声晚上好。

translate.english: When I go out for a walk and meet an acquaintance, I will kindly say good evening.
